mutants.code:
def max_matches_stolen(n, m, containers):
    containers.sort(key=lambda x: x[1], reverse=True)
    max_matches = 1
    i = 0
    while n > 0 and i < m:
        (ai, bi) = containers[i]
        add = min(n, ai)
        max_matches += add * bi
        n -= add
        i += 1
    return max_matches
